metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Prerequisites  To access meeting information in Microsoft Teams, your admin must first configure Adobe  Acrobat as the default PDF viewer in Microsoft Teams. The admin must also allow a list of  endpoints to integrate Teams with Acrobat and grant permissions for Adobe Acrobat to be  the default app in Teams.  After the admin accepts the permissions, you can integrate your Microsoft Teams account  with Acrobat.  1. In Acrobat Home, select Add meeting transcripts under Third-party apps.  2. Under...

Interactive form  To create an interactive form, use the Prepare Forms tool. See Create a form from an existing  document.  Flat form  To enable the Fill & Sign tools, from the hamburger menu (File menu in macOS)  choose Save As Other  > Acrobat Reader Extended PDF > Enable More Tools (includes  Form Fill-in & Save).  The tools are enabled for the current form only. When you create a different form, redo this  task to enable Acrobat Reader users to use the tools.

Fill in interactive forms  An interactive form contains fields that you can select or fill in.    1. If necessary, select either the Hand Tool or the Select Tool from the context menu of  the page (right-click on the page to open the context menu).     The pointer changes to a different icon as you move it over a field. For example,  the Hand   tool changes to an I-beam  when you can type text into the form field.  Some text fields are dynamic, meaning that they automatically resize to accommoda...

stakeholders?  •  Customize Your Message  • Have you added a personal touch to the subject and message  fields, highlighting key property details?  •  Create and Share the Link  • Did you generate a shareable link and copy it for distribution?  •  Send the Invitation  • Have you sent the email or shared the link through your  chosen platform?  •  Follow Up  • Are you tracking who has accessed the document and  following up with clients for feedback or next steps? PDF/A Compliance  Creates the PDF so that it conforms to the selected ISO standard for long-term preservation of  electronic documents.    Security tab of the Adobe PDFMaker preferences  The settings available for PDFMaker depend on the application in which you’re using  PDFMaker.  Require A Password To Open The Document  When selected, makes the Document Open Password option available, where you enter a  password that users must use to open the document.
